title: MWCO

slug: mwco
categories: []
tags: []
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $1.0M
  in 2019-2020 on contracts with MWCO. The average
  contract duration was 2.41 year, and the average contract
  value (not including contracts under $10k) was $2.0M.
  The longest contract was 4.78 year. The largest contract
  by value (including amendments) was $5.1M.
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '1.0M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2019-2020'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor: '7'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor_with_amendments: '3'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '43%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage_by_vendor: '50%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments_by_vendor: '1.33'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value_by_vendor: '-1.1M'
s424_mean_duration_by_vendor: '2.41'
s421_mean_contract_value_by_vendor: '2.0M'
s425_max_duration_by_vendor: '4.78'
s422_max_contract_value_by_vendor: '5.1M'
